name: Neon D-Fence
description:
Full Version Game. No micro transactions or hidden costs in game. All future updates included in the one time purchase

Tower defense meets endless runner.
Play on ten different maps, plan your strategy, place your towers, unlock a variety  of "goodies" to aid in your Survival! How long can you SURVIVE for the ultimate high score?

## Updating Instructions ##
(currently when I update the files you end up with a duplicate app launcher, in some cases that can cause itch.io to use one of the older app launchers. . . so I recommend uninstalling and then install again, at least for now that works good) and don't worry your save file will be fine.
